snippet: The restaurants announced a new menu item, the Most American Thickburger, which is a beef patty topped by a split hot dog.
abstract: Carl's Jr and Hardee's announce new menu item that will combine hot dog and hamburger into single sandwich containing 1,030 calories and 64 grams of fat; offering will be called Most American Thickburger.
lead_paragraph: The restaurants announced a new menu item, the Most American Thickburger, which is a beef patty topped by a split hot dog.

headline.main: Burger and Hot Dog Combined at Hardees-Carl’s Jr. Outlets
headline.print_headline: Burger and Hot Dog Combined at Hardee’s and Carl’s Jr.
